page.title: 12A DAY IN MY LIFE.
page.content: My dad wakes me at 7.15 a.m. I listen to my radio fora while and then get dressed. I go downstairs for breakfast with a cup of tea. Then I go to the bathroom to clean my teeth and wash my face. I put on my jumper and comb my hair, then leave for school, arriving just before 9 a.m. Morning break is at 10.30 a.m. The bell goe for lunch at 12 noon. We eat at 12.30 p.m. and go back into school at 1.10 p.m. Afternoon break is at 2.20 and we finish school at 3.40 p.m. On the way home I buy two football stickers. When I arrive home I watch T.V. for a while and have tea at 5 p.m. I play out with my friends until 8 p.m. and go to bed at 8.45 p.m. I read until about 9.15 and then go to sleep. Ben. (Aged 9 yrs)
